lead_paragraph: WALPIN--Gerald. The Federal Bar Council notes with profound sorrow the passing of our former President and longtime member Jerry Walpin. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife Sheila and the entire family. Vilia B. Hayes, President 1/3
snippet: WALPIN--Gerald. The Federal Bar Council notes with profound sorrow the passing of our former President and longtime member Jerry Walpin. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife Sheila and the entire family. Vilia B. Hayes, President 1/3
